title: Hoards Custom Theme
description: Custom color theme definition for the hoards TUI. Place this file at ~/.config/hoards/custom-theme.json

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for validation and IDE support

name.description: Display name for your custom theme

base.description: Main background color for the entire TUI. Used for the main window background.

surface0.description: Slightly elevated surface color. Used for list items, cards, and popup backgrounds.

surface1.description: Borders, separators, and inactive elements. Used for divider lines and unfocused borders.

text.description: Primary text color. Used for main content, tool names, and important text.

subtext0.description: Secondary/dimmed text. Used for descriptions, hints, less important labels, and placeholder text.

blue.description: Links, highlights, and selected items. Used for focused elements, active tab indicators, and cursor highlights.

green.description: Success states and installed tools. Used for 'Installed' status, success messages, and positive indicators.

yellow.description: Warnings, stars/favorites, and attention indicators. Used for the star icon on favorited tools and warning messages.

red.description: Errors and destructive actions. Used for uninstall confirmations, error messages, and critical alerts.

mauve.description: Categories and tags. Used for tool category labels and classification badges.

peach.description: Source badges. Used for package source indicators (cargo, apt, npm, pip, etc.).

teal.description: Sparklines and metrics. Used for usage graphs, sparkline charts, and numerical metrics.

color.description: RGB color value with components from 0-255
